# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [1.0.0] - 2024-10-15

### Added
- Initial release of MarzPay Python SDK
- Complete API coverage for all MarzPay endpoints
- Collections API for money collection from customers
- Disbursements API for sending money to customers
- Phone Verification API for phone number verification
- Accounts API for account management
- Balance API for balance operations
- Transactions API for transaction management
- Services API for service operations
- Webhooks API for webhook handling and validation
- Comprehensive utility classes (PhoneNumberUtils, GeneralUtils, CallbackHandler)
- Professional error handling with custom exceptions
- Comprehensive test suite with 71 tests
- Complete documentation and examples
- PyPI package ready for distribution

### Features
- Support for all MarzPay API endpoints
- Uganda phone number validation and formatting
- Webhook signature verification
- Reference generation utilities
- Amount formatting and currency handling
- Comprehensive error handling
- Production-ready with full test coverage
